name: Diva Germ Guard Detergent Powder
description:
Diva Power Germ Guard Detergent Powder with Kohomba and Lime is formulated to kill 99.9% of germs that settle on the surface & amongst the fibers of your clothes.
Other benefits: 
Superior cleaning
Long lasting fragrance to keep your clothes fresh for long *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
